mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User SET uEnterDate = NOW(), uUpdateDate = NOW(), uEmail = #{uEmail}, uPwd = #{uPwd}, uName = #{uName}, uPhone = #{uPhone}, uBirth = #{uBirth}, uNickName = #{uNickName}, uGender = #{uGender}, uTOSAgree = #{uTOSAgree}, uPIPAgree = #{uPIPAgree}, uIP = #{uIP}, uThumbnail = #{uThumbnail}, uRole = #{uRole}
